Class StandardContextHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.deploy.StandardContextHandlerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextHandlerFactory
public class StandardContextHandlerFactory extends Object implements ContextHandlerFactory
Creates a ContextHandler from a WAR file and/or one or more XML files and property files.

  • Method Details

    • newContextHandler

      public ContextHandler newContextHandler(Server server, Environment environment, Path mainPath, Set<Path> otherPaths, Attributes deployAttributes) throws Exception
      Specified by:
      newContextHandler in interface ContextHandlerFactory
      Parameters:
      server - The server for the context.
      environment - The environment for the context
      mainPath - The Path of the main file of the context (e.g. a WAR file or XML)
      otherPaths - Other files associated with the context (e.g. property files)
      deployAttributes - Attributes describing the details of the deployment and that are made available to the XmlConfiguration. The attribute names can be
      • Attributes defined in Deployable
      • ContextHandlerFactory.DEFAULT_CONTEXT_HANDLER_CLASS_ATTRIBUTE
      • ContextHandlerFactory.ENVIRONMENT_ATTRIBUTE
      • ContextHandlerFactory.ENVIRONMENT_XML_PATHS_ATTRIBUTE
      Returns:
      The created ContextHandler
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is a problem creating the ContextHandler
